segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and the woman doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so bold, taking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is already wobbling under the boy’s weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be so shocked when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, and she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children do this often.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t pull the whole jar down on himself.
segments.speaker: PAR
